scripts.start: pnpm install && dotnet fable watch src -o js --sourceMaps --runFast vite
scripts.preview: pnpm install && dotnet fable src -o js --run pnpm vite preview
scripts.build: pnpm install && dotnet fable src -o js --run pnpm vite build
scripts.clean: rm -rf src/bin src/obj js dist node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
